displaytitle: Kent State Remembered: A girl screams before the body of a dead student lying face down on the campus of Kent State University in 1970. National Guardsmen had fired into a crowd of demonstrators and four persons were reported dead in the disorders
creditline: Museum purchase, Fowler McCormick, Class of 1921, Fund
markings: Caption affixed to top of print: (NY7-May 3) - - KENT STATE REMEMBERED - A girl screams before the body of a dead student lying | face down on the campus of Kent State University in 1970. National Guardsmen had fired into | a crowd of demonstrators and four persons were reported dead in the disorders (mmm52355fls/ | Copyright Valley Daily News) 1985    Slug: Kent State

makers.displaymaker: John Filo, born 1948, Natrona Heights, PA

texts.textentryhtml: At Kent State University armed members of the Ohio National Guard were deployed on May 4, 1970, to respond to approximately five hundred student demonstrators. Four unarmed students were fatally shot by Guardsmen and nine more were wounded. When the shots rang out, senior John Filo was working in the student photography lab. During the confrontation and ensuing chaos, he captured the agonized expression of fourteen-year-old Mary Vecchio as she kneeled over the body of Jeffrey Miller. Widely published, Filo’s Pulitzer prize–winning image transcended documentary photography to become an icon of the Vietnam War era, a signifier to this day of student protest and collective condemnation of violence.
Museum purchase, Fowler McCormick, Class of 1921, Fund

bibliography.boilertext: "Acquisitions of the Princeton University Art Museum 2018," Record of the Art Museum, Princeton University 77/78 (2017-18)

caption: John Filo (born 1948, Natrona Heights, PA), Kent State Remembered: A girl screams before the body of a dead student lying face down on the campus of Kent State University in 1970. National Guardsmen had fired into a crowd of demonstrators and four persons were reported dead in the disorders, May 4, 1970. Gelatin silver print; 16.3 × 25 cm (image), 19 × 26 cm (sheet).
